RelatedSentence: Students enrolled in each program received the program 's winning book , Grumpy Bird , at a special event held two weeks ago .
One Book 4 Colorado is co-hosted by Reach Out and Read Colorado , Colorado State Library , Lt. Governor Joe Garcia and Denver Preschool Program .
The program donated over 75,000 books that were given to local libraries , preschools and doctor 's offices .

RelatedSentence: The library offered a special story time for students at each of the learning centers and distributed approximately 100 books locally .
The library offered a special story time for students at each of the learning centers and distributed approximately 100 books locally .

Children between the ages of 3 and 6 years are encouraged to attend on Wednesdays from 10:30 to 11:30 a.m. Youth between the ages of 7 and 12 years are encouraged to attend on Wednesdays from 1:20 to 2:30 p.m. There will be programs with guest speakers , special events and entertainers .
